Caption: Fig. 1. Proﬁle of author Ben Shneiderman. The text consists of three sections describing general information, research areas, and collaboration relationships. The visualization below provides information on joint work with co-authors on a timeline. The sidebar shows details on demand, whereas the top-right bar chart displays the temporal distribution of publications. Badges at the top summarize achievements. The cut-outs on the right are two different versions of the sidebar (list of collaboration groups and similar authors).
